mapper.select: select j.project,#{date} AS date,#{pKey} as pKey, sum( CASE WHEN j.issuestatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS assignedBugs, sum( CASE WHEN created >= #{date} AND created < date_add(#{date},interval 1 day) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS newBugs, sum( CASE WHEN j.issuestatus = 10318 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS confirmedBugs, sum( CASE WHEN j.issuestatus = 10343 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS resolvedBugs, sum( CASE WHEN j.issuestatus = 10342 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS feedbackBugs, sum( CASE WHEN j.issuestatus = 10345 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS closedBugs from jiraissue j, project p where j.project = p.id and j.issuetype = 10102 AND p.pKey=#{pKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY j.project

SELECT j.project,#{pKey} as pKey, sum( CASE WHEN c.stringvalue=10211 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS seriousBugs, sum( CASE WHEN c.stringvalue=10210 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS secondaryBugs, sum( CASE WHEN c.stringvalue=10209 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS generalBugs, sum( CASE WHEN c.stringvalue=10208 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS layoutBugs, sum( CASE WHEN c.stringvalue=10207 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS textBugs, sum( CASE WHEN c.stringvalue=10310 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS newfeatureBugs, sum(CASE WHEN j.issuestatus =10345 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS totalBugs from customfieldvalue c,jiraissue j,project p where j.project = p.id and j.issuetype = 10102 and c.issue = j.id and c.customfield = 10310 AND p.pKey=#{pKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY j.project
